history.proof: intros Hnodes Hcohd. unfold dom. intro x. unfold upd. destruct (this == x) eqn:Heq. - shelve. - apply not_eq_sym in Heq. + shelve. + shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap Hnodes : this \\in nodes Hcohd : TPCCoh d x : nat_ordType Heq : (this == x) = true Unable to unify "x \\in nodes" with "x \\in UMC.dom_op (UMC.mixin (UMC.class (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap))) (UMC.upd_op (UMC.mixin (UMC.class (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap))) this s (dstate d))".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap Hnodes : this \\in nodes Hcohd : TPCCoh d x : nat_ordType Heq : False Unable to unify "TPCCoh d" with "(x \\in UMC.dom_op (UMC.mixin (UMC.class (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap))) (UMC.upd_op (UMC.mixin (UMC.class (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap))) this s (dstate d))) = (x \\in nodes)".

In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap Hnodes : this \\in nodes Hcohd : TPCCoh d x : nat_ordType Heq : False Unable to unify "is_true (this \\in nodes)" with "(x \\in UMC.dom_op (UMC.mixin (UMC.class (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap))) (UMC.upd_op (UMC.mixin (UMC.class (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap))) this s (dstate d))) = (x \\in nodes)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
this: Equality.sort nat_eqType
d: dstatelet
s: heap

Goal:
this \in nodes -> TPCCoh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
TPCCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
nid = nat : Set
Notation heap := Heap.heap
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
Notation seq := list
nodes = [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : seq nid
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
l3 : forall d : dstatelet, tpc_coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
tpc_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohIDom : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI p I d -> dom (dstate d) =i Protocols.Exports.nodes p d
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
rely_loc : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_rely w this s1 s2 -> find this (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find this (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.safe_safe : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s -> send_safe st this to (getStatelet s l) msg
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find z (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
l1 : forall d : dstatelet, tpc_coh d -> valid (dstate d)
localCoh = fun n : nid => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> Pred heap
domU : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), dom (upd k v f) =i [pred x | cond U k & if x == k then valid f else x \in dom f]
Record tuple_of (n : nat) (T : Type) : Type := Tuple { tval : seq T; _ : is_true (size tval == n) } Arguments tuple.tuple_of _%nat_scope _%type_scope Arguments tuple.Tuple [n]%nat_scope [T]%type_scope [tval]%seq_scope
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
hooks_consistent = fun (c : context) (h : hooks) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc ls : Label) (t : nat_ordType), (z, lc, (ls, t)) \in dom h -> (lc \in dom c) && (ls \in dom c) : context -> hooks -> Prop
Actions.send_act_step : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1 -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop

```coq
intros this Hnodes Hcohd.
unfold dom. intro x.
unfold upd. destruct (this == x) eqn:Heq.
- apply eq_true_iff_eq in Heq. subst. reflexivity.
- apply not_eq_sym in Heq. apply Hcohd. apply Hnodes.
```

original: intros this Hnodes Hcohd. unfold dom. intro x. unfold upd. destruct (this == x) eqn:Heq. - apply eq_true_iff_eq in Heq. subst. reflexivity. - apply not_eq_sym in Heq. apply Hcohd. apply Hnodes.
